notes: The health talent increases maximum health capacity, and keeps the current health percentage.
The lightning bounces in 0.25-second intervals, so hitting all targets takes 1/1.5/2/3.5 seconds.
Does not bounce on invisible units or units in the Fog of War.
Can never hit the same unit twice per cast.
All bounces together can deal up to 375/700/1125/2250 (TagTalent 875/1400/2025/3750) damage (before reductions).
The hidden buff is required for the lightning to jump.
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
params: Blocked fully only when primary target.
abilities.story: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

notes: When ground-targeted (or area-targeted) with no heroes within 325 radius, it still provides the 125/200/275/350 range flying vision and True Sight.
The lightning first applies the damage, then the debuff.
When unit-targeted, vision and True Sight are provided at its position upon cast. The vision is stationary, it does not follow the unit.

When ground-targeted, Lightning Bolt does not require any vision or true sight to hit invisible or enemies in the Fog of War. With the cast range and search radius, a ground-targeted Lightning Bolt can hit an enemy hero up to 1025/1075/1125/1175 range away. Only searches for enemy heroes, including illusions clones, and creep-heroes. Whichever is the closest to the center gets hit. When ground-targeted, the vision and True Sight is always centered on the targeted point, even if it found a target.
With the cast range and search radius, a ground-targeted Lightning Bolt can hit an enemy hero up to 1025/1075/1125/1175 range away.
Only searches for enemy heroes, including illusions clones, and creep-heroes. Whichever is the closest to the center gets hit.
When ground-targeted, the vision and True Sight is always centered on the targeted point, even if it found a target.
The flying vision and True Sight last for 0.2 seconds. The True Sight is provided by an aura, and its debuff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
In order to hit a non-hero unit, it must be directly targeted.
The lightning particles and sound effect during the cast time are visible and audible to everyone.

The level 25 talent, adds a 325 radius to this ability, so that it cannot directly target units anymore. As long valid enemy targets are within radius, Lightning Bolt does not require any vision or true sight to hit invisible or enemies in the Fog of War. The visual effects on the ground which mark the effect radius are visible to everyone. Does not upgrade Nimbus's Lightning Bolt.
As long valid enemy targets are within radius, Lightning Bolt does not require any vision or true sight to hit invisible or enemies in the Fog of War.
The visual effects on the ground which mark the effect radius are visible to everyone.
Does not upgrade Nimbus's Lightning Bolt.
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325 range.
params: Spell immune units are still revealed by the True Sight.
Mini-stun and damage are blocked when hit, no matter if directly targeted or not. Vision is only blocked when directly targeted.
abilities.story: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.

notes: The damage from Static Field is flagged as HP Removal, so it does not trigger any on-damage effects.

Static Field only works with Zeus' abilities. It does not react on items, or on other units' abilities (e.g. in Ability Draft). Static Field always applies its damage before the triggering ability applies any of its effects. Arc Lightning applies Static Field's damage on each enemy it jumps on. Lightning Bolt (manually cast, and from Nimbus) applies Static Field's damage on whoever it hits, regardless of whether they were directly targeted or not. Thundergod's Wrath applies Static Field's damage on all hit enemies. If an enemy was not hit due to invisibility, they are not damaged.
Static Field always applies its damage before the triggering ability applies any of its effects.
Arc Lightning applies Static Field's damage on each enemy it jumps on.
Lightning Bolt (manually cast, and from Nimbus) applies Static Field's damage on whoever it hits, regardless of whether they were directly targeted or not.
Thundergod's Wrath applies Static Field's damage on all hit enemies. If an enemy was not hit due to invisibility, they are not damaged.
If Arc Lightning or Lightning Bolt get blocked by Spell Block, Static Field damage is not applied.
Does not affect Roshan.

With Aghanim's Shard, Static Field turns into an active ability. The passive aura is still present. Interrupts Zeus' channeling abilites upon cast. When cast, it immediately applies Static Field's damage, as well as a movement speed slow on the closest enemy within 2000 radius. Also grants Zeus' 900 flying vision for 3 seconds. Can target any unit, but prioritizes heroes. Treats creep-heroes as heroes. Can target Roshan as well, but only applies the slow debuff on him. First applies the damage, then the slow debuff. When cast while stationary, Zeus jumps 250 range upwards. When cast while moving or while being moved, he leaps in an arc towards his facing direction with a length of 450 and height of 250. Zeus is not disabled during the jump and can still turn, attack, and cast abilities and items during it.
Interrupts Zeus' channeling abilites upon cast.
When cast, it immediately applies Static Field's damage, as well as a movement speed slow on the closest enemy within 2000 radius.
Also grants Zeus' 900 flying vision for 3 seconds.
Can target any unit, but prioritizes heroes. Treats creep-heroes as heroes.
Can target Roshan as well, but only applies the slow debuff on him.
First applies the damage, then the slow debuff.
When cast while stationary, Zeus jumps 250 range upwards.
When cast while moving or while being moved, he leaps in an arc towards his facing direction with a length of 450 and height of 250.
Zeus is not disabled during the jump and can still turn, attack, and cast abilities and items during it.
abilities.description: Zeus shocks any enemy hit by his abilities, causing damage proportional to their current health.
params: Static Field can be cast to perform a Heavenly Jump, shocking the closest visible enemy (TagTalentprioritizing heroes) within 2000 range, dealing Static Field damage to them and reducing their movement speed by 100% for 2.5 seconds. If Zeus is moving forward, he will jump towards that direction. Cooldown: 11. Manacost: 75.
abilities.story: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.

notes: Requires Aghanim's Scepter to be unlocked. In Ability Draft, Nimbus can be unlocked by the player that drafted Thundergod's Wrath.
In Ability Draft, Nimbus can be unlocked by the player that drafted Thundergod's Wrath.

Casts regular Lightning Bolt based on its current level on the closest valid enemy target. This means it also applies the mini-stun and provides vision and True Sight around the target. It also means that the Nimbus does nothing if Lightning Bolt is not learned. The level 25 Lightning Bolt effect radius talent does not upgrade Nimbus' Lightning Bolt. In Ability Draft, Lightning Bolt must be drafted as well for the Nimbus to strike enemies with it.
This means it also applies the mini-stun and provides vision and True Sight around the target.
It also means that the Nimbus does nothing if Lightning Bolt is not learned.
The level 25 Lightning Bolt effect radius talent does not upgrade Nimbus' Lightning Bolt.
In Ability Draft, Lightning Bolt must be drafted as well for the Nimbus to strike enemies with it.

The damage source is the Nimbus itself, meaning certain on-damage effects react on the Nimbus rather than on Zeus (e.g. Blade Mail). This also means that any outgoing damage amplification or damage reduction do not affect the Nimbus' bolt damage either. Despite this, the bolts still trigger Static Field on their targets, which is still sourced to Zeus, and thus affected by outgoing damage manipulation.
This also means that any outgoing damage amplification or damage reduction do not affect the Nimbus' bolt damage either.
Despite this, the bolts still trigger Static Field on their targets, which is still sourced to Zeus, and thus affected by outgoing damage manipulation.

Starts striking immediately upon cast if an enemy is within the area. Also strikes immediately when the last strike was longer than an interval ago and an enemy enters the area. Always strikes the closest valid target. There are no priorities. Cannot target wards or buildings. The Nimbus can strike invisible units and units inside the Fog of War. Can strike up to 12 times over its full duration, considering the default 2.5 strike interval.
Also strikes immediately when the last strike was longer than an interval ago and an enemy enters the area.
Always strikes the closest valid target. There are no priorities. Cannot target wards or buildings.
The Nimbus can strike invisible units and units inside the Fog of War.
Can strike up to 12 times over its full duration, considering the default 2.5 strike interval.
The visual effects on the ground which mark the Nimbus' radius are visible to everyone.
abilities.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.
params: Spell immune units are still revealed by the True Sight.
Lightning Bolts from the Nimbus are not blocked.
abilities.story: Where the thunder god's ire grows, storm clouds quickly gather.

notes: Only hits enemy heroes, including the Tempest Double, but excluding Meepo Clones, illusions and creep-heroes. Does not hit invulnerable or hidden enemies.
Does not hit invulnerable or hidden enemies.

The damage cannot target invisible enemies, but the ability itself can. Thundergod's Wrath first applies its damage, then provides its vision and True Sight. This means if an invisible enemy is not revealed beforehand, it only applies the vision and True Sight around them, but not the damage.
Thundergod's Wrath first applies its damage, then provides its vision and True Sight.
This means if an invisible enemy is not revealed beforehand, it only applies the vision and True Sight around them, but not the damage.

Thundergod's Wrath provides 500 radius flying vision and 900 radius True Sight around each struck hero. The vision and True Sight last for 3 seconds. The True Sight is provided by an aura, its debuff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
The vision and True Sight last for 3 seconds.
The True Sight is provided by an aura, its debuff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Hitting all 5 enemy heroes collectively deals 1500/2000/2500 (TagTalent 2000/2500/3000) damage (before reductions).

The visuals and sound effects during the cast time are visible and audible to everyone. The sound upon cast is global. Enemies can hear it when they have vision over Zeus. Else they can only hear the local hit sound. Shifts the lighting of the whole map for a split second, which is also visible to everyone.
The sound upon cast is global. Enemies can hear it when they have vision over Zeus. Else they can only hear the local hit sound.
Shifts the lighting of the whole map for a split second, which is also visible to everyone.
abilities.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be. Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
params: Provides vision and True Sight over spell immune enemies. Does not attempt to damage spell immune enemies. Spell immune units are still revealed by the True Sight.
abilities.story: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.

description: Zeus, the Lord of Heaven, is a ranged intelligence hero who functions almost solely as a nuker. He is usually played as a semi-carry ganker type hero, who instead of utilizing disables, focuses solely on delivering tremendous amounts of magical damage to his foes. With the high cast range, and ease of use and low cooldown on his spells, he is able to deliver the most superb and consistent magical damage of any hero in the game. Arc Lightning is a highly spammable nuke that creates a stream of lightning that bounces between enemy foes (up to fifteen times at max level), dealing minor damage. Lightning Bolt is more focused, dealing heavy damage to a single target, also on a very low cooldown. It can also be targeted on the ground, providing vision and True Sight and potentially striking a nearby enemy, making him effective even against fogged and invisible enemies as well and allowing him to locate enemy wards. Static Field is a potent passive ability that allows Zeus's magical damage to scale into late game, dealing damage to all enemies equal to a certain percentage of their' health whenever he hits them with a spell. Finally, his ultimate Thundergod's Wrath allows him to strike all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter their position, inflicting heavy damage. It can be used for multiple purposes: to finish off low-health enemy heroes limping away, to soften up the entire enemy team during a teamfight, or even to scout out the enemy's position. With the ability to strike down enemies both near and afar, the Lord of Heaven ensures that nobody can escape his wrath.
history: Lord of Heaven, father of gods, Zeus treats all the Heroes as if they are his rambunctious, rebellious children. After being caught unnumbered times in the midst of trysts with countless mortal women, his divine wife finally gave him an ultimatum: 'If you love mortals so much, go and become one. If you can prove yourself faithful, then return to me as my immortal husband. Otherwise, go and die among your creatures.' Zeus found her logic (and her magic) irrefutable, and agreed to her plan. He has been on his best behavior ever since, being somewhat fonder of immortality than he is of mortals. But to prove himself worthy of his eternal spouse, he must continue to pursue victory on the field of battle.
